uk.gov.gchq.palisade.cache.service.impl

Class SimpleCacheService

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.palisade.cache.service.impl.SimpleCacheService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheService, Service

    public class SimpleCacheService
extends Object
implements CacheService
    The implementation for a CacheService that can persist various object types to arbitrary backing stores. Instances of this class primarily add an instance of BackingStore to which the work of persistence is delegated. This class is responsible for managing data into and out of any backing store so clients have a transparent interface to a backing store and the actual backing store implementation is abstracted away.
    API Note:
    no parameters may be null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleCacheService

        public SimpleCacheService()
        Create and empty backing store. Note that this is for use by serialisation mechanisms and any attempt to use an instance of this class without first initialising a backing store will result in exceptions being thrown.

    • Method Detail

      • applyConfigFrom

        public void applyConfigFrom(ServiceConfiguration config)
                     throws NoConfigException
        Description copied from interface: Service
        Gives the initial configuration to a service to allow it to configure itself. This method is called by the internal system to configure a service.

        Subclasses should override this implementation which does nothing.

        Subclasses should ONLY throws NoConfigException if a required configuration key is not present

        Specified by:
        applyConfigFrom in interface Service
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration
        Throws:
        NoConfigException - if some required element of the configuration is not present

        Tells a service to save its configuration to the given configuration object. This method is called by the internal system to save a configuration.

        Subclasses should override this implementation which does nothing.

        Specified by:
        recordCurrentConfigTo in interface Service
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration to place initial configuration information into

        Adds a record to the cache according to the contents of the AddCacheRequest parameter.
        Specified by:

        Type Parameters:

      • get

        public <V> CompletableFuture<Optional<V>> get(GetCacheRequest<V> request)
        Description copied from interface: CacheService
        Retrieve an item from the cache. The request should be parameterized according to the expected type of object to be retrieved. If the cache couldn't find an entry for the requested key, then the Optional returned will be empty.
        Specified by:
        get in interface CacheService
        Type Parameters:
        V - the value type being retrieved
        Parameters:
        request - GetCacheRequest containing the key.
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture that contains an Optional for the cached key

      • list

        public CompletableFuture<Stream<String>> list(ListCacheRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: CacheService
        Returns a list of all cache entries available that match the given prefix. The cache will look in the namespace for the service named in request and return all key names that start with the given prefix.
        Specified by:
        list in interface CacheService
        Parameters:
        request - the request configured with a prefix
        Returns:
        a list of strings that are cache keys
